conceptmap-obs-code-to-value-type (http://ehealth.sundhed.dk/ConceptMap/conceptmap-obs-code-to-value-type)

ACTIVE. Published on 2020-11-26 by ehealth.sundhed.dk (ehealth.sundhed.dk: http://ehealth.sundhed.dk/term...).
